thread.title: Connecticut senator says Congress inaction 'responsible' for school schootings

title: Connecticut senator says Congress inaction 'responsible' for school schootings
text:
Connecticut senator says Congress inaction 'responsible' for school schootings 4:24pm EST - 01:47 
Connecticut Senator and Democrat Chris Murphy highlighted the shooting at   on the Senate floor Wednesday and said Congress is 'responsible' for the shooting because of inaction by Congress.   
Connecticut Senator and Democrat Chris Murphy highlighted the shooting at   on the Senate floor Wednesday and said Congress is 'responsible' for the shooting because of inaction by Congress.  //reut.rs/2EJf814
